title: Scout a College Player for the Draft
description: A pro team is evaluating a top college player ahead of the upcoming draft.

tasks.description: Compile the player's college career statistics and any available athletic combine data (e.g., 40-yard dash time).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all available quantitative data on the player.

tasks.description: Analyze game footage to assess their skills against pro-level competition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed report on the player's strengths and weaknesses.

tasks.description: Conduct a background check and review interviews to assess character and intangibles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers information on the player's character and work ethic.

tasks.description: Create a final draft profile and assign a draft grade to the player.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive profile, grading the player as a 'top 10 pick'.
